Text.Name: RockBrown
Text.Desc: Rocky mountain of brown color. Composed of crumbly substance, it is rather difficult to mine usable stone from it.

Text.Name: RockGray
Text.Desc: Rocky mountain of gray color. Composed of compact substance, it can be mined for building material.

Text.Name: RockMarble
Text.Desc: Mountain rock rich in marble, from which Marble can be mined.

Text.Name: RockJade
Text.Desc: Mountain rock rich in jade, from which Jade can be mined.

Text.Name: RockCinnabar
Text.Desc: Mountain rock rich in cinnabar, from which Cinnabar can be mined.
